name: erfa

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
ERFA (Essential Routines for Fundamental Astronomy) is a C library
containing key algorithms for astronomy.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: pal
dependent_to.description:
The PAL library is a partial re-implementation of Pat Wallace's popular
SLALIB library written in C using a Gnu GPL license and layered on top
of the IAU's SOFA library (or the BSD-licensed ERFA) where appropriate.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
